title: Generative AI-Enabled Microlearning Class Design to Strengthen Environmental Science Behavioral Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and understanding of elementary science education methodologies
context.additional_context: Curriculum design competency development for mathematics majors and prospective elementary teachers, focusing on strengthening environmental science behavioral competencies using generative AI.

learning_goals: Generate at least three instructional design frameworks for strengthening Environmental Science Agency (ESA) competencies using generative AI
Critically evaluate AI-generated content and revise it to align with ESA-linked learning objectives
Design and propose implementation strategies for five or more mobile-optimized microlearning activities
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
